|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;E3826; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.46 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.00 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, VGA out, power switch, metal case, heat sink |addchip = Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;1;,,, 25V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD16414Q5;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17507Q5A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;5;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;4;,,, 3V-28V D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS53219A;;3;,,, 4.5-18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54326;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;2;,,, Dual Channel (3-Phase CPU/1-Phase GPU) SVID, D-CAP+ Step-Down Controller for IMVP-7 Vcore;TI;TPS59641;;1;,,, PWM DC/DC Controller for GPU Core-Voltage Regulator;Renesas;ISL95870B;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 3-lane,3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
